h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Cat Eye Beads Location
content: The Cat Eye Beads can be found by killing the Wandering Wight in the Forest of Wolves \- Outside the Forest Shrine area in Black Wind Mountain. The Wight is located along the main path towards Guanyin Temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cat_Eye_Beads.md', within the main section titled 'Cat Eye Beads', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Cat Eye Beads Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Cat Eye Beads can be found by killing the Wandering Wight in the Forest of Wolves \- Outside the Forest Shrine area in Black Wind Mountain. The Wight is located along the main path towards Guanyin Temple.
